name: DA NANG INTERNATIONAL FIREWORKS COMPETTION (DIFC 2015)
description: In 2015, the city continues to organize the 7th with the theme "Da Nang - Symphony of colors" to 2 nights April 28th and 29th with the participation of five teams from five continents including Team South Africa (Fireworks for Africa company) - Africa representative ,Team USA (Pyrotecnico company) - America representative, Australia (Howard & Sons Pyrotechnics company) - Australia representative , Team Poland ( Surex - Firma Rodzinna company) - Europe representative and Danang - Vietnam - Asia representative.
